aka: The Giant of Es Vedra and Other Fairy Tales
this_title: Es gegant Des Vedrà i altres rondalles
trans_title: The Giant of Es Vedra and Other Fairy Tales
introduction: During a visit to the apartment that her parents intend to rent, little Agnès makes contact with the ghost of the former owner, the writer Joan Castelló Guasch. He tells the little girl three amazing legends: 'All Saints' Night,' 'The Skulls of Can Fita' and 'The Giant of Es Vedrà.'
chinese_title: Es gegant Des Vedrà i altres rondalles
